subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Robin Soderling won the ABN Amro final in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, when Mikhail Youzhny retired because of a thigh injury while trailing, 6-4, 2-0.
snippet: Robin Soderling won the ABN Amro final in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, when Mikhail Youzhny retired because of a thigh injury while trailing, 6-4, 2-0.
